comprehensive_overview: Merqury is a computational tool designed for efficient and accurate quantification of mappable k-mers in noisy long-read assemblies, with a focus on repeat resolution in the presence of high error rates.
core_features:
1. Quantification of mappable k-mers
2. Addressing repeat resolution in noisy long-read assemblies
3. Handling high error rates
4. Analysis of repetitive regions in genomes
